message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.PF, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with a communication system transmitting packets of information, which is a common topic in the networking (cs.NI) and information theory (cs.IT) communities. The use of queuing theory and exponential service times suggests a systems and control (cs.SY) perspective. The management of arriving packets and the proposal of a new metric could also be of interest to the performance analysis (cs.PF) community. Finally, the modeling of a random process and the analysis of the age of information could be relevant to the machine learning (cs.MA) community.
